item.title: Org-roam & Windows
item.description: Org-roam Org-roam is a note-taking tool for Emacs using Org-mode. It is a replica of RoamResearch: "A note-taking tool for networked thought". Both are based in the Zettelkasten method, which is described as: Using a Zettelkasten is about optimizing a workflow of learning and producing knowledge. The method was developed by Niklas Luhmann and the literal translation is: Zettelkasten = Box of notes. In simple words: Org-roam allows you to make connections between your notes, in order to make a more efficient creative/learning process.
